item.title: Wildflower meadow genesis
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: A neighbour has very kindly lent us a brush cutter, so Iâ€™ve been busy for the past couple of weeks clearing the bramble from the coppice area (pictured above) to plant more trees, and the 2 acre sloping pasture so that we can create a wildflower meadow.
